meanings.definition: The quality or state of being optimal.

meanings.sent2: She carefully considered all the optimalities before making her decision.
meanings.sent3: The optimalities of the perfectly organized desk made everyone jealous.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sports, teamwork is one of the optimalities for success.
meanings.sent5: The optimalities of a healthy lifestyle include regular exercise and balanced nutrition.

meanings.definition: The most favorable or desirable conditions.

meanings.sent2: The optimalities of the vacation spot made it a popular destination.
meanings.sent3: The optimalities of having a day off work include sleeping in and relaxing.
meanings.sent4: The optimalities of a sunny day at the beach are hard to beat.
